title: Shower thought. All items without passives/actives
body:
Would the game be more balanced if there were no item actives or passives? All items would just be different variants of the stats they give without actives or passive for the hidden power they provide. No more deathcap give bonus % ap. No more IE giving increased crit damage.
Limits the stats items could give to:
Health
Armor
Magic Resist
Health Regen.
AD
AP
Armor/Magic Pen
Attack Speed
Crit Chance
Movement speed
Maybe Tenacity
Life Steal
I might be missing some
I think this would give Riot an easier out to balance the game but the downside is it might be a little boring. No more Greivous wounds or bonus healing from items. No more bonus shielding. No more duskblade procs for stepping briefly into a bush. No more Bork, No more immolate, No more rylais slow, etc
They could buff kits to compensate
Havent had coffee yet so take the idea with a grain of salt.

replies.body: It could possibly become more balanced but the game would become significantly more bland.
That would be extremely boring. Dota has so many active and interesting awesome items so this game is lacking.

More balanced, yes, but way more boring.

Technically, the most balanced game would be if all champions were identical in every way and there were no items.

As much as you see people bitching about balance, nobody would play it if it were really balanced. The game is imbalanced because it is fun. Although, it really isn't that imbalanced as it is compared to other games.
